alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 10:41PM EST until January 10 at 7:45PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Elkhorn Creek Near Peaks Mill affecting Franklin County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Elkhorn Creek Near Peaks Mill. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Stillhouse Hollow Road floods. At 11.0 feet, Schoolhouse Road floods. At 12.0 feet, North Scruggs Lane floods near Elkhorn Campground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Sunday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 10.7 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued tomorrow.
